name: Blog Site Template
description: Complete blog website template with multiple pages, built using SEVDO frontend compiler
author: SEVDO Team

backend.description: FastAPI backend with PostgreSQL database and authentication

pages.Home.s: Homepage with latest posts, hero section, and newsletter signup
pages.Blog.s: Complete article listing with search, filters, and pagination
pages.Article.s: Individual article page with sharing and related posts
pages.About.s: About the author/blog with personal story and testimonials
pages.Contact.s: Contact information, form, and FAQ section

installation.backend: Copy auth.py and configure database credentials
installation.frontend: Compile .s files using SEVDO frontend compiler
